steps.name:
okapiRequest ("{ method: 'POST',
  path: 'finance/ledgers',
  body: 
   { id: 'ad582205-b2e5-4044-b0a1-493df7006182',
     name: 'E2E ledger 141.2953161893622896',
     code: 'E2ELC784.2802402838342896',
     description: 'E2E ledger description 307.27465556358834896',
     ledgerStatus: 'Frozen',
     currency: 'USD',
     restrictEncumbrance: false,
     restrictExpenditures: false,
     acqUnitIds: [ '0ebb1f7d-983f-3026-8a4c-5318e0ebc041' ],
     fiscalYearOneId: 'fb86a6b6-5934-4eaf-ab09-80d45785be99' } }")

createLedgerApi ("{ id: 'ad582205-b2e5-4044-b0a1-493df7006182',
  name: 'E2E ledger 141.2953161893622896',
  code: 'E2ELC784.2802402838342896',
  description: 'E2E ledger description 307.27465556358834896',
  ledgerStatus: 'Frozen',
  currency: 'USD',
  restrictEncumbrance: false,
  restrictExpenditures: false,

  fiscalYearOneId: 'fb86a6b6-5934-4eaf-ab09-80d45785be99' }")
